name: Archie the Archeological Automaton
description:
Archie is exploring the abandoned village of Bockhampton, in Saskatchewan Canada when he is attacked by alien nanomachines defending the archeological site. Shoot the robots.
This game was created by Team Spice Boys as part of Portsmouth Game Jam 2020.

Controls
WASD - Move
Left Mouse Button - Shoot
Right Mouse Button - Use Grenade

Team Spice Boys are:
Euan Damant - Programming
Tom Ford - Art
James Mamone - Art
James Rance - Programming
